reviews.text: We stayed a week in an 'executive' one-bedroom apartment. It was very good - nice bed, which could be separated from the living room (although that made it seem a bit cramped, so we didn't), and good bathroom, living room and kitchen. The balcony would have been nice, but there was (is - probably for the next 9 months) a major building project underway just across the street, so too noisy to use the balcony during the day (and at night, there's a sports centre nearby which can also be pretty noisy!). But a very good location; a Woolworth's already open in the new building opposite (for those from the UK, this is not the 'Woolies' you remember, but a superb large supermarket!) where we bought good food and wine for dining in the apartment, but also restaurants, cafes, bars just a short walk away (the Italian trattoria 'Caffe e Cuccina' is great, and pretty authentic), and trams right outside. Oh, and loads of fashion shops. Excellent if you want to be in the South Yarra or Prahran areas (Prahran market also excellent for food), and trams on Toorak Road will take you to Botanic Gardens and downtown, etc. But Federation Square ain't what it's cracked up to be!
reviews.title: Good apartment, great location

reviews.text: I stayed here for 6 nights. Not only was an (unpaid) request for an early check-in honoured but I was upgraded to a larger apartment than I'd booked for the duration of my stay. The apartments are comfortable and spacious, the location was convenient for my trip and the staff were friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Convenient and comfortable

reviews.text: Stayed in a 2 room apartment for 3 nights. Very conveniently located along Chapel Street with a Woolsworth right opposite. Chapel Street is a very pleasant place. Near enough to Melbourne CBD (15mins via tram) & yet away from the City. Facilities are standard of all service apartments. Decor is modern and fresh. The indoor spa pool on the top floor was a hit with my boys.
reviews.title: Great Location...

reviews.text: One bummer, the ac. Had trouble getting the right temperture. The cooling function did not work. It became to warm & stuffy & we had to switch it off to have a comfortable night's sleep.
reviews.title: Comfortable stay

reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights in Aug at Quest on Chapel.
reviews.title: Excellent location and all the convenience of a serviced apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at quest on chapel for a weekend in July and found that it was great for the price you pay! We had a 1 bedroom room which was very spacious. It has a large living area, 2 TVs (1 in the bedroom & 1 in the lounge), a decent size bathroom with a tub and a small balcony. The appartments are a 2 minute walk down to the main shops along chapel st and you also get a parking spot.
reviews.title: Great location & great price

reviews.text: For the price you pay (under $200 a night), it was well worth it. Would definately stay here again if I want to be in toorak.
reviews.title: Wow- now I know where to stay in Melbourne!

likes.disliked: — no room service, but you can get a breakfast pack the night before from the reception desk

reviews.title: If you want lots of space this is the place
reviews.text: I travel to Melbourne regularly on business and my accomodation is usually booked by work - this time they booked me into the Quest on Chapel. The apartments are huge- and I mean apartment, not just a room with a kitchenette. There was only me, but I was able to spread out - sit on the lounge, eat breakfast at the dining table and leave my work all over the desk. I even had a lovely little balcony. The kitchen is impressive for a studio, with great appliances.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartments are large and roomy, very bright and spotlessly clean.They had all that you need, all the cooking utensils and a full kitchen, not all apartments usually have them. We had a great night's sleep too. There is also a gym and spa within the building.
reviews.title: Second stay, just the best location!!,

reviews.text: The location is so central and South Yarra has all the restaurants and shopping you could possibly need.
reviews.title: Home Away from Home

reviews.text: I stayed in Australia for three months & Quest on Chapel was my home base. After every trip I took, I always looked forward to returning to my "Quest family."
reviews.title: Comfy, spacious and great location

reviews.text: * New, clean, & comfortable- all six visits
reviews.title: A very good hotel with excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: * Centrally located in hip South Yarra
reviews.title: Great Location
